title: Test
yAxis: Number of people doing freelance work in million
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of people doing freelance work in million, with a total of 6 data points.
Overall Number of people doing freelance work in million has increased over the Year.
Number of people doing freelance work in million is slightly increasing from 2014 to 2017, and lastly roughly constant from 2017 to 2019.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2016 and 2017.
Max Number of people doing freelance work in million about 57.3 was recorded at Year 2017
Min Number of people doing freelance work in million about 53.0 was recorded at Year 2014
This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Number of people doing freelance work in million, with a total of 6 data points. The chart has 3 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely increasing which exists from 2014 to 2017.
Additionally, the next significant trend is moderately increasing which exists from 2018 to 2019.
Also, the next significant trend is slightly decreasing which exists from 2017 to 2018.
